title: Natural Language Interaction
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to understand my natural speech so that I can interact with it comfortably without needing to remember specific commands.

title: Voice Feedback System
summary: As an older adult, I want the system to provide clear and friendly audio feedback for every interaction so that I can understand the system's responses and actions confidently.

title: Medication and Appointment Reminders
summary: As an older adult, I want to set personalized reminders for my medication and appointments using voice commands so that I can manage my daily activities and maintain my health independently.

title: Multimodal Interaction Options
summary: As an older adult, I want to interact with ALFRED using both voice commands and simple touch controls so that I can easily manage my daily tasks and stay connected with my family and friends without frustration.

title: User-Friendly Onboarding Process
summary: As an older adult, I want a straightforward onboarding process that guides me through the initial setup and familiarizes me with the system functionalities so that I can use ALFRED independently and confidently.

title: Contextual Help and Support
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to provide context-sensitive help based on my interactions so that I can receive assistance when I struggle with tasks.
